meanings.definition: Work (moistened flour or clay) into dough or paste with the hands.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys kneading the dough to make delicious bread.
meanings.sent2: The baker was kneading the dough to prepare for baking.
meanings.sent3: While kneading the dough, she accidentally made a funny face.
meanings.sent4: His fingers moved like a pianist's, kneading the dough with precision.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic kneading of the dough filled the kitchen with a comforting aroma.

meanings.definition: Squeeze or press (something) with the hands.
meanings.sent1: The masseuse was gently kneading the client's shoulders to relieve tension.
meanings.sent2: She kneaded the clay into a beautiful sculpture.
meanings.sent3: He was kneading the stress ball so vigorously it almost popped!
meanings.sent4: The sculptor's hands moved skillfully, kneading the clay into shape.
meanings.sent5: The baker's hands were strong, kneading the dough effortlessly.
